data.name: The Chase
data.detailed_description:
“The Chase” is a first-person survival horror game developed by RAM Studios. The story revolves around a couple that has been separated for some time. Shane Briggs moves to Leeds where his new office opens.
When he gets a sudden telephone call from Holly(his wife), he goes in search of her ancestral home where she had been living for a long time. There he goes with budding hopes to meet Holly after a long time. But what Shane gets to face is a puzzle of mysteries and uncertainties.
Will he survive? The only hope for him is to strive through the darkness and pray to God that everything will be alright.

“We all chase many things in life. Dreams, jobs, even people… But when you begin to chase after your past, sometimes you might never be able to return again. Of course, it’s your choice”



  • # You are defenseless against enemies. Plan your approach.
  • # Stealth-based gameplay.
  • # Patience is the key. Sometimes it's okay to run away.
  • # Dark atmosphere will immerse you in the world
  • # Find and collect items that will help you to survive in the darkness.
  • # Story with multiple endings. Your choice.
